entry.title: WIND WARNING, Salluit
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:22 p.m. EDT Sunday 23 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending overnight then cloudy. Risk of freezing rain. Fog dissipating near midnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming south 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 23 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming south 70 gusting to 90 in the afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 23 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind south 70 km/h gusting to 90 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 70 near midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 23 April 2023
